EntryName	FPGT_HUMAN
ProteinName	Fucose-1-phosphate guanylyltransferase (EC 2.7.7.30) (GDP-L-fucose diphosphorylase) (GDP-L-fucose pyrophosphorylase)
GeneName	FPGT GFPP
Length	340
Function	Catalyzes the formation of GDP-L-fucose from GTP and L-fucose-1-phosphate (PubMed:9804772). Functions as a salvage pathway to reutilize L-fucose arising from the turnover of glycoproteins and glycolipids (PubMed:9804772).
